name: HornetSong (GroenDev)
description: This is a personal hobby project of me trying to learn unity and C# and create something of a game. If there is a lot of bugs and glitches, that explains it. Don't worry though, the wall jumping is not a bug, it's a feature. Oh yeah, about the game: it's basically just a really shitty ripoff of Silksong, and a sort of 2d platformer adventure game.
